com.oscarsong.environment_sim

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oscarsong.environment_sim.Grid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.oscarsong.environment_sim.GridInterface, com.oscarsong.environment_sim.GridManInterface, com.oscarsong.environment_sim.GridWomanInterface

    public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.oscarsong.environment_sim.GridManInterface, com.oscarsong.environment_sim.GridWomanInterface
    Singleton class that provides grid for the map that simulated people live on. However only the length and width of the map is visible to others.

    Author:
    oscarsong
